website_summaries.verdict: A terrific lumbar support pillow that is crafted from top-notch materials and delivers exceptional value.
pros: Ergonomically designed to help alleviate back pain and tightness
Includes premium memory foam that conforms to the back to deliver maximum pain relief
Offers 2 adjustable straps so you can easily attach the pillow to a chair
Comes in a variety of attractive colors
cons: Less durable than many comparable pillows

website_summaries.verdict: This memory foam lumbar cushion for the car is designed to help make long car rides more comfortable.
pros: Mesh cover keeps the pillow from getting too hot
Customer service from the company is very responsive
Good thickness and back support for long drives
Also works for an office chair
cons: Some users found this pillow to be less supportive than they wanted or needed

customer_reviews.title: I started having really bad lower back pain
customer_reviews.text: Working a desk job where I'm sitting 7+ hours a day, I started having really bad lower back pain. Tried foam roller, stretching, massages... nothing solved it. Ever since buying this, pain is gone. Came back and bought another for my boyfriend. I highly recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: thatgirlfrombr

customer_reviews.title: Good Lumbar Support Cushion.
customer_reviews.text: Did not meet my needs, but a good Lumbar Support cushion, nevertheless. I have lower back discomfort and thought this cushion would help relieve the pain. The cushion didn't fit my lower back so it didn't help; too small.. I contacted Amazon Returns and Amazon said the item was not eligible for a free return. So, I contacted LoveHome. It gave me a complete refund and said I could keep the cushion. Now that's five star customer service. As for the cushion, it is well made, firm and attractive. I believe it would be an excellent lumbar support cushion for someone smaller. That is, under 6 feet..
customer_reviews.author: Dr. Steve

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable support pillow at a reasonable price
customer_reviews.text: The cushion fits my back well. My major is computer science so I am sitting at a computer most of every day. I've had issues with my back for as long as I can remember and have two deteriorating discs in my lower back. With the memory foam, I'm good all day, have significantly less back pain and have just ordered another one so I don't have to lug it back and forth between home and the office because I refuse to be without it. Great follow up customer service too. Highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: Ziqi

customer_reviews.title: works well
customer_reviews.text: Really like this pillow, however, I wish there was a way to remove ALL the straps easily for a stationary pillow. I use it on one of our recliners and I am concerned of it leaving marks on the leather, so I had to cut the straps to be sure.
customer_reviews.author: Mickey Motto

customer_reviews.title: Highly Recommend
customer_reviews.text: I rarely write reviews on Amazon, but this product truly deserves it. I work at an office, so most of my day is spent sitting in a chair. Although I try to be conscious of my posture, I tend to slouch. I noticed I was having discomfort in my back, and wanting to find a solution I took to Amazon lol. But anyways I found this pillow and I can tell you this is a simple, amazing, affordable product. It just might be the only product I've gone out of my way to recommend to other people. You will not be disappointed with this purchase! :)
customer_reviews.author: maxemoose

customer_reviews.title: Not good quality. Don't make the investment.
customer_reviews.text: This lumbar support back cusion does not provide much support at all. It is small and flimsy. I'm not sure how it is rated so highly. I would recommend that if you really need lumbar support you make an investment and get a better quality cushion. Don't go for the inexpensive price or that it is a best seller.
customer_reviews.author: M. S. Horowitz

customer_reviews.title: Good Back Support
customer_reviews.text: So far, I like this as a way to keep my sitting posture ergonomically correct at the desk. This lumbar support replaced pillows that I used for my desk chair which I constantly had to re-position. Simple elastic strap with buckle for attaching to chair back works well enough. Fortunately my chair has a brace in the back at the optimal height to hold the strap and lumbar support in the correct position for the height for my back.
customer_reviews.author: fargozombie

customer_reviews.title: Does what it advertises...
customer_reviews.text: I use this brace primarily on my office chair but have also used it on a kitchen table chair and family room couch. So far it seems to help with my bad back, (Spondy), as long as I'm using it on something with a rigid back to begin with. We have a softer couch in the living room and it does little to give support. Overall, it does what most of these type supports do, force better posture when sitting. And that's the key for most back and neck problems. I would definitely buy it again.
customer_reviews.author: ShichidanBB

customer_reviews.title: Such odd straps!
customer_reviews.text: I ended up returning this item. Although it was a great pillow as far as quality and possibly durability, the straps are placed so the pillow is vertical and not horizontal. It would have made more sense to have the option of using the pillow horizontally. I didn't want to have to sew new straps on.
customer_reviews.author: LRogers

customer_reviews.title: Leaves shoulders and neck with no support.
customer_reviews.text: I really needed some lumbar support in my new Prius and this works for that purpose. Problem is it is so thick, I am now totally without shoulder and neck support while driving. I feel like my car seat has been turned into a low back desk chair. So, while it serves it's purpose, I am giving this item a fail.
customer_reviews.author: A. Derifield

customer_reviews.title: Not my solution
customer_reviews.text: Man, I was hoping this would be a godsend. I am desperately in need of something to make my work drafting chair more comfortable. Sadly, this isn’t it. The design is constantly sliding down, and doesn’t do a thing for me. If anything, it just takes up seat room. While I can’t stand the design at all, the material is sturdy and durable so the product isn’t all bad I suppose
customer_reviews.author: Dani

customer_reviews.title: Top Notch Back Support
customer_reviews.text: The car accident 3 years ago left me with disc damages and endless back pain. I really needed a lumbar support cushion and have tried a few but nothing amazed me as this little guy. Well, I am beyond amazed. It fits and holds my back perfectly and it really reduces the pain right away. And somehow it keeps my back warm which also helps with the pain. I start to think how many I need so I won't have to carry it around. I would say this is a top notch back support. It is definitely a must-have as it makes such a difference for my life. It is all about supportive!
customer_reviews.author: AMZN FAN

customer_reviews.title: Provides Needed Support
customer_reviews.text: This back cushion does provide the needed extra support and allows me to be more comfortable in my desk chair. Since I am short it helps my back to feel more supported. The only reason for 4* is that it does slide down on my chair and I can't get it to stay in position. Every couple of hours I need to slide it back up to the right position. It might be my type of chair since it's a bit more of an open back, but either way it's a bit annoying to have to re-position it frequently. That being said I do find it useful and it serves its purpose.
customer_reviews.author: J. Simpson

customer_reviews.title: Back atcha with love!
customer_reviews.text: A sprained knee followed by an auto accident, as a passenger, left me with multiple problems including a sorrowful back. This was exacerbated by my sitting at home in an office chair with no back support. This lumbar back cushion afforded instant support and relief. Following the advice of another reviewer, I made sure to strap it properly to the chair's back support, not on the base of the seat. Voila! P.S. The cushion is well made, was perfectly packaged, and arrived overnight.
customer_reviews.author: Reb MacRath

customer_reviews.title: Nice back support
customer_reviews.text: I just received my back support today. So far so good! I like that I can take it with me! I have tried so many different pillows and they don't last. I hope this does!
customer_reviews.author: IHavAVue

customer_reviews.title: Didn't work for me
customer_reviews.text: I'm not a giant (5' 10" 200 lbs) but gave not been able to use this pillow comfortably. I wanted it for lumbar support in my vehicle but I find it to narrow so it doesn't fit all the way across my back. If it were one of the round cylinder shaped ones it would probably work but since it is shaped more or less like a cushion the vertical edges press into my back and make it very uncomfortable. If it were wide enough to completely go across my back I think it would be fine. As is it just sitting in a closet collecting dust
customer_reviews.author: DMS1960

customer_reviews.title: Very Comfortable
customer_reviews.text: Another COVID-19 purchase. I bought this product because of working from home as a result of the shelter-in-place advisory in my state. My back had begun to hurt badly because I was sitting all day and not in a comfortable office chair. I bought this and attached it to my chair and my problems went away. It was easy to attach to the chair and can easily be moved from one chair to another. I definitely recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Nesia03

customer_reviews.title: Back support, sciatica and scoliosis
customer_reviews.text: I purchased LoveHome Memory Foam Mesh Lumbar support cushion for my sciatica and scoliosis. I was recently diagnosed and the pain was pretty bad. Did therapy for 3 weeks and it improved, my therapist recommend a back support. I went on Amazon and searched Out several different ones and decided On this Memory form cushion . I find it gives me the added support I need for back and relieve of pain. I would highly recommend it. Dawn
customer_reviews.author: J L

customer_reviews.title: It works!
customer_reviews.text: I was having issues with lower back pain after sitting at the computer for more than an hour. I was using pillows until I saw this. It feels soooo good to have the right pressure pushing on the lower back and I have no issues now while sitting at the computer desk. The secure fasteners make it so it will not move and you can actually raise or lower it to your needs. I'm very happy with my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: ViceP

customer_reviews.title: Back Cushion..box was open
customer_reviews.text: Box was slit open when delivered but thankfully no damage to product inside. Cushion itself was packed in plastic and the plastic wrapping was intact. Cushion looks good and was quite comfy. Installation was easy and it included an extension belt which might be handy for some chairs. Since the cushion is quite deep, it may compromise on the seating area in your chair unless it is a very deep chair for you.
customer_reviews.author: KRiSP

customer_reviews.title: Nice for a work chair
customer_reviews.text: I use this for my work chair and it took me some time to get used to it. When I first tried it I felt like I was falling out my seat. Once I repositioned it I felt better. It definitely helps with my back pain since I sit for long periods of time.
customer_reviews.author: Leecie

customer_reviews.title: Don't use with leather bucket seats!
customer_reviews.text: Got this for my 2012 Chevrolet Sonic since my back has been hurting after driving (seats has no lumbar adjustment). It's a little bit stiff, but it's not a good fit for my car. The bucket seats make the left/right edges stick out a bit far and the pleather makes it slide around. I also had to remove the headrest because the new cushion changed my entire torso's angle. It's quite comfy! Just make sure you are accounting for everything. I'd imagine this works best on old cloth seats, or very bare-bones office chairs.
customer_reviews.author: Peter Kenneth

customer_reviews.title: Feel great now!
customer_reviews.text: So comfortable and soft - yet supportive. I love it. I use his with the seat cushion I also purchased from Amazon and together with the foot rest, I feel great at my desk now!
customer_reviews.author: Heather G.

customer_reviews.title: SURPRISES
customer_reviews.text: I have this product for over a year and now the back strap that is supposed to be able to stretch and clamp the pieces together ripped a loose and it ripped a lose at the end where it connects to the cushion. I guess all good things come to a End. i would love to keep using it but will need it again and i have coworkers who have admired it and interested to where i purchased it from but im scared to say now and scared to purchase another one because fear it will break again and be a purchase i have replace yearly from being attached to a chair no movement.
customer_reviews.author: LOVES NICE THINGS

customer_reviews.title: Instant relief
customer_reviews.text: My wife has a seriously damaged back ,due an accident a few months ago, that has her in constant pain. Purchased this support to try to find her some relief and in her words, “It’s fantastic”. She moves it from desk chair, to recliner and gets instant relief. Highly recommend this product!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not worth it.
customer_reviews.text: So if you put this on something that isn’t going to be used often or using it on something your primarily not moving around much this product will work great. I had this in my car for about a week, and I basically work from my car with a lot of in an outs all day. The memory foam couldn’t keep up an was almost completely flat by the end of the second week.
customer_reviews.author: cody

customer_reviews.title: Immediate back relief - very satisfying
customer_reviews.text: I work from home, and am sitting at my desk for long periods during the day. I was experiencing very severe back pain from prolonged duration in the desk chair. When I got this pillow, there was almost immediate back relief. I still get up and stretch during the day, but this pillow has been a life saver. My back doesn't hurt anymore, and it is extremely comfortable. HIGHLY recommended.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Immediate relief of lower back pain
customer_reviews.text: I've had this for 5 minutes now and my back already feels SO MUCH BETTER! I have one of those task chairs, so the back isn't solid all the way to the seat and I was unsure this was going to work, but it is really really really nice. Please get one if you are in pain. It will be worth it. Oh my, what a relief! I feel so much more supported! Having 2 straps helps keep in place better I would think.
customer_reviews.author: Tracy

customer_reviews.title: Great product...helps with pain and posture
customer_reviews.text: While this is a great product, my physical therapist said it is good for relief maybe for a long drive if your in pain or to use here and there. Not to rely on day in and day out. You must strengthen your core and your back. If you use any product like this too much, you will not build your strength. I love this product. The quality is great! I bought one for my son too.
customer_reviews.author: Andi

customer_reviews.title: Works, just don't use it for lengthy roadtrips
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for a roadtrip from DC to Atlanta. I drove 6 hours up and 6 hours back and my friends drove the remaining miles. The cushion definitely bolstered my lower back and took the pressure off, so that was great; but after 3 hours, I started to notice it retains a significant amount of heat. Even blasting my A/C during the whole ride, it just really absorbs your body heat and may cause you to feel uncomfortable lower back sweat. I ended up using it less on my ride back. I'm going to use it at my deskjob but will not use it for extensive roadtrips in the future.
customer_reviews.author: Randomtrackguy

customer_reviews.title: No more back pain!
customer_reviews.text: I sit at my desk for hours on end and bought this in brown (to match my brown leather chair 😊) to support my back and to prevent me from slouching and causing neck and back pain. I bought based on other reviews and so glad I did. My chronic back pain is so minimal now. It worked so well that I bought a second one for my TV chair. Love the different color choices to blend in with your chair color.
customer_reviews.author: Maria H.

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: I sit in my rocker/recliner a lot in the evenings and found that my back would be hurting each evening due to the way it does not support my lower back. I ordered this and it has helped immensely! I simply cut off the straps and sit in my chair to support my lower back. Also a good knee pillow at night when I sleep has helped, so the two in combination have practically cured my back problems.
customer_reviews.author: Barbara Terry

customer_reviews.title: Lumbar Support could use some more support
customer_reviews.text: I purchased the LoveHome Memory Foam Lumbar Support Back Cushion and when I opened the package it had a strong smell. I had to air out for a few days before using it. It did provide the back support I needed but it kept falling through the crack as the locks are not sturdy enough to keep it from falling. I have had to stop and keep pulling it up at least every hour. Other than that it would be a nice cushion. Not sure I would buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Ruth S.

customer_reviews.title: Great support
customer_reviews.text: I pulled this out of the box immediately after it arrived. I work from home and spend all 9 hours in front of a computer. I tucked this into my chair, and it is lovely. I am going to try it on other chairs to see if it works better anywhere else. My main chair is a bucket seat, so it doesn't sit quite right. I'm not normally a fan of mesh materials, but I feel like it will be a way to keep it from getting sweaty. I also feel that it is very durable. I look forward to trying it in different chairs and also while gaming.
customer_reviews.author: Mischa Rose

customer_reviews.title: Yes
customer_reviews.text: So I purchased this to alleviate back pain from long commutes in Los Angeles (I would slump down in my chair and my back would round, giving me terrible pain) that were ruining my life. The reason why this works so well is that it elevates your back from the seat. It’s made a huge difference in my posture because it puts you upright instead of slumping forward. It’s a little squishy now but it does the job and I’m glad I purchased it. If they obliterated the traffic on the road or implemented efficient public transit in this god-forsaken dump, that would make things perfect. For now, I have to settle for this back pillow.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda Faries

customer_reviews.title: Gamechanger
customer_reviews.text: This is a gamechanger for me. It fits perfectly in my DXRacer chair and even matches the color. The only con of putting this on a gaming chair is that the straps are useless, but its not a problem once you position it behind your back
customer_reviews.author: Cole

customer_reviews.title: Great Back Support
customer_reviews.text: I like how supportive this lumbar support is. Fits great on any chair and retains its shape. I had sciatica and sitting for long periods of time would send shooting pain down my leg. This pad helped relieve the pain and put my back in a better position.
customer_reviews.author: Ben

customer_reviews.title: Great Product
customer_reviews.text: I bought this product based on the prior reviews and my urgent need for support as I was working from home at the start of the pandemic. And it did not disappoint!!! I raved about it so much that my fiancé tried it and he loved it! So I had to immediately order a 2nd one! Great product! The delivery arrived on time and the packaging was terrific!!
customer_reviews.author: Leah

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for people with bad backs
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my mom who is always complaining about back pain and is very picky about chairs she's willing to sit in. She now carries this with her everywhere, and chairs she refused to use before are now comfortable for her. She asked for a second one to have one in both of our houses.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Took away my back pain from crappy office chair
customer_reviews.text: This is more like a softer memory foam than others I have tried. I wanted to get a harder one but I tried this one out for a week and the back pain I was struggling with just stopped, so I kept it and 2 months later the pain hasn't returned. Love this!
customer_reviews.author: WillHenry

customer_reviews.title: Proper positioning of cushion
customer_reviews.text: I started a new job and although the chair that was provided was a beautiful leather executive chair, I went home with lower back pain. This cushion made all the difference. Before I purchased I saw a note that said to position the cushion a little higher than the seat, so it's positioned on your lumbar area. Of course, you still have to make a conscience effort to sit back. Don't worry about fit. It's adjustable and also comes with straps to extend if necessary. I did not have to use the extended straps, but I was concerned because the chair is wide. It looks nice too. Will recommend to anyone that starts to get lower back pain.
customer_reviews.author: George B.

customer_reviews.title: The best lower back support foam I ever had!
customer_reviews.text: This is absolutely the best lower back support foam that I ever had! I have a Herman Miller chair in the office, but due to long-time sitting and maybe disappropriate sitting posture, I am gradually having mild sciatic pain. That is sad and making a lot of discomforts. I have a similar Samsonite foam for my car seat, but it can’t beat the firmness and the strong support of this product at all! I used this foam for almost a week, together with Herman Miller chair, and now feel sciatic nerve is stopping hurting that often.
customer_reviews.author: Vicky

customer_reviews.title: Makes sitting all day bearable
customer_reviews.text: I've been using this for 5 months now and I'm so happy with my purchase. Shortly after starting a new job which involves sitting at a desk for hours I started having lower back pain. I started using this cushion and immediately noticed a difference. My back no longer hurts at the end of the day. The cushion is well made and has held up so far. The straps work well and I don't really have a problem with the cushion slipping. I did have to look up pictures of proper lumbar cushion placement but once in place I have't had to mess with it. Definitely recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Megan

customer_reviews.title: Great back support!
customer_reviews.text: I recently started a new job and it requires a lot of time at a desk. I immediately noticed some of my old back problems coming back. However, after I purchased this cushion that has all disappeared. I would highly recommend this to someone with known lower/middle back problems, that’s looking for some relief.
customer_reviews.author: Logan

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable !
customer_reviews.text: Got this lumbar support pillow for my recliner today. With the extension straps, it fit my recliner back well. I have soreness in my back from lack of support, and this gives firm support, but it doesn't feel like you are leaning on a rock. I will recommend this to anyone that will listen !
customer_reviews.author: J@CK WILSON,Jr.

customer_reviews.title: Real comfortable office chair back support
customer_reviews.text: Comfortable ... Supports my back properly ... It was so comfortable that I ordered a second support cushion a couple of days after the first one arrived ... Now I have one at home and one at work ... The clip on strap extensions were a nice addition ... Excellent engineering
customer_reviews.author: Diving Nut

customer_reviews.title: Life Saver During Quarantine
customer_reviews.text: This has absolutely saved me during this pandemic! I’ve had to work from home and don’t have a desk or private table to sit at. The first 2 weeks of the shelter in place order were killing my back because I was having to work in my bed. This made all the difference in the world, and now I have no more back pain!! It definitely works if you prop it against pillows on your bed.
customer_reviews.author: Jana Lusk

customer_reviews.title: Life changing for chronic pain
customer_reviews.text: I have a degenerative illness and I've had chronic pain for over a decade. This allows me to sleep, sit, and lay with comfort. It's a true game changer. I wouldn't hesitate to purchase it. I even sleep on my side with it supporting my waist.
customer_reviews.author: Joshua Steinauer

customer_reviews.title: Good product.
customer_reviews.text: I do recommend buying this if you don't have one of those expensive gaming chairs with the lumbar support. It's helpful for your posture and it does seem to make a noticeable difference.
customer_reviews.author: Ken

customer_reviews.title: My back was very happy when I got this!
customer_reviews.text: I work full time as an illustrator and graphic designer. Good back support is crucial. My office chair was lacking so I got this guy to help me out. It comes with stretchy strips to help hold it in whatever position you'd like for your office chair. Helped my back, posture, and lessened my back pain alot. It's also very comfy, cute, and durable! :)
customer_reviews.author: Ally

customer_reviews.title: Works well and no problems with quality
customer_reviews.text: This product has worked extremely well for me. As for as use goes, it's all about you placing it correctly or finding how it supports you best. I have been using it for several months and it works well. I have had no problems with it losing firmness or shape. It is a memory foam type material so it has always bounced back well. The cover can be taken off easily and washed if it gets dirty.
customer_reviews.author: Adam

customer_reviews.title: It really works!
customer_reviews.text: For the most part, I use this while I am sitting on the couch. It gives me the support that I need while reading or using my iPad. It makes a huge difference, my level of pain is much improved. I also use it while I'm laying on the couch, I prop it under my knees to take the pressure off of my low back. My hamstring is very happy about this change. 😃
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Nice for steno chairs and such but just okay for recliners
customer_reviews.text: I have to have lumbar support in recliner chairs. This works well except that there's no way it can be held stationary and falls forward whenever you get up. To be fair, I haven't seen a lumbar support pillow just for recliners and they all probably do eth same thing.
customer_reviews.author: CharEll

customer_reviews.title: Close to perfect
customer_reviews.text: Exactly what I needed. My back feels wonderful now... I spend all day in a chair at work (not by choice) and all night in a chair at home (by choice, love video games)... Was gonna replace my office chair with something pretty expensive that was supposed to solve my lower back pains... But this pillow has solved them for a lot less... If I had one gripe... I find it actually not thick enough... Maybe if it was firmer it would give me that tad bit of extra support I need. Despite that, I'm gonna be buying a second one so I don't have to carry it back and forth from work and home..
customer_reviews.author: Prince

customer_reviews.title: Great for the recliner
customer_reviews.text: I have lower back issues. Bought this to give extra support in my recliner. It works!! Now if I wake up in the middle of the night, asleep in my recliner, I don't feel like a stuck turtle on its back trying to get up. Great product
customer_reviews.author: Adam

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: I bought this because I had extreme lower back pain sitting in my work chair for 8 hours. When I used the pillow the first day, my pain is so much better and I'm much more comfortable. I would highly recommend this.
customer_reviews.author: Carol A. Tilley

customer_reviews.title: Works, but won't replace lumbar support bucket seats
customer_reviews.text: I use the product in my car. I like the product because it works for my back and I have received relief. However, I find it uncomfortable in it's design. It seems to be exaggerated in it's size, so I always feel like I have this thing pushing into my back. I've test driven a few cars later with lumbar support built into the seat. This product does not come near to that "perfect" level of comfort and effectiveness, but it does relieve pain for my particular disposition.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: The Perfect Lumbar Support Cushion
customer_reviews.text: Through the years, I've purchased countless lumbar support cushions. They all ended up being Salvation Army donations. Recently, a friend of mine purchased one at a car dealership. When I went to have my vehicle serviced, I took one out of the package and trialed it whilst waiting...another fail, and I felt so smug as I didn't spend $25 to discover that it did't work for me. On to Amazon to research for another cushion. After a couple of hours, viewing pictures, reading descriptions and reading reviews, I determined to take another shot on this particular product. Success!!! Finally I found my forever after lumbar support cushion!
customer_reviews.author: Llamamadre

customer_reviews.title: So comfy I don't want to stand up!
customer_reviews.text: I have had back issues for the past year (specifically related to my sacrum). I especially get pain when sitting in any kind of seat/chair for at least 20 minutes. I bought this cushion because the NY Times recommended it. I started using it and it immediately worked for me and I was able to sit for extended periods of time with no pain at all. I decided today to purchase a second cushion so that I have one at work and one at home. For $20, this is a life saver!
customer_reviews.author: Vince Giordano

customer_reviews.title: Relieved my back pain and improves my posture
customer_reviews.text: I normally get back pain after sitting for a while and have to stand up and move around to deal with the pain. This cushion gives my back a good support and my posture improves. I no longer get lower and mid back pain when sitting for a long time. I do make some adjustment to the height so it fits my back perfectly. Highly recommended for people who gets back pain after sitting for a long time.
customer_reviews.author: Jade

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: My husband has used several back cushions in his wooden kitchen chair and he says this is the best ever. It fits in the chair well and supports his back with excellence. Please know this wooden chair is his "easy chair" as he's retired and spends most of his days at our kitchen table doing his crossword puzzles and watching television keeping up with the news. He finds this cushion more comfortable than using our recliners!
customer_reviews.author: Jean H. Martin

customer_reviews.title: So soft
customer_reviews.text: Been having to drive around for work nowadays. Back pain from sitting uncomfortably for long hours. This memory foam stuff feels good for the lower back. Even got an extra one for when I am at the office.
customer_reviews.author: SJ

customer_reviews.title: Good Back Support for the office
customer_reviews.text: I am happy I got this and sad I didn't do it sooner. So much comfier with this! It supports my back and I can lean into it without extending or crunching my shoulders. I am 5'1 so it also keeps me further up on the seat which is really nice. I recommend it - easy fix to a standard office chair
customer_reviews.author: Diana

customer_reviews.title: Good lombar support on long commutes & drives
customer_reviews.text: Very supportive lumbar pillow, used in my car. Definitely helps me line up my hips while driving and maintain a good low back curve. The elastic straps are a little odd the way it wraps around the car seat making it slightly annoying to get in and out of the vehicle but it's not a big deal for the comfort. For anyone in a location that gets a good cold winter it will be very firm if left in the car overnight, however it will relax once warmed up.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Best I've found to support lumbar region.
customer_reviews.text: Sometimes I drive long stretches at a time. This helps keep my back from suffering too much. Though it becomes a bit mushy after about 350 - 400 miles at a stretch. But because I am continually adjusting it up and down for best fit (at the time of need) I do not use the straps. You can buy cheaper low back supports, but I think you get what you pay for - it's your back and the strain adds up. Buy the best you can afford.
customer_reviews.author: EricP

customer_reviews.title: Good for pregnancy relief
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my car during the long commute from work to home during pregnancy. My back pain was getting very severe at 5 months of pregnancy so I purchased this for some relief. It helped quite a bit however, it wouldn’t strap around my car seat so I was constantly having to adjust the pillow. The cushion was also a little too thick for my liking so I had to lean my car seat back so i wouldn’t be so close to the steering wheel. Overall, a good purchase minus these 2 cons. It’s a comfy support cushion
customer_reviews.author: Aaliyah

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for my lower back
customer_reviews.text: This was just what I needed for my lower back. I sit in my office chair most of the day and I was starting to have lower back pain and I knew it was my chair. Ordered this for ba k support and I got instant relief. Now I can work in comfort.
customer_reviews.author: Sharon C.

customer_reviews.title: Great Support
customer_reviews.text: This was a great addition to add to my executive chair. My chair is large and i needed back support for my lower back. It is comfortable and keeps me from having a gap between my back and my chair.
customer_reviews.author: Monica H.

customer_reviews.title: Really consider this product
customer_reviews.text: This product was a great help with my aching back and I bought a second one for my wife because it is made of excellent materials and is designed for a sore and aching back and it does the job!
customer_reviews.author: Michael P. Oliver

customer_reviews.title: Decently comfortable
customer_reviews.text: It's decently comfortable but it kind of sits in your seat awkwardly so it takes a second to get used to. However, it definitely reduced my back pain. My main issue is that one of the clips that holds it on broke within 2 weeks and I didn't even have it that tight around my seat.
customer_reviews.author: Kaleb

customer_reviews.title: Excellent product
customer_reviews.text: I love this product. I had severe back pain due to a herniated disc in my lumbar, so this product brought me a big relief. I use it at the office, where I seat 8 hours daily, so I definitely can tell how useful it is. I highly recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Wonder Woman

customer_reviews.title: Please use a lumbar support.
customer_reviews.text: Great product for lumbar support. I feel the back straps should have been either a little more elastic or atleast longer to wrap up in chairs with wide back support.
customer_reviews.author: sankarsh

customer_reviews.title: BEST back support out there!
customer_reviews.text: Looked online for chiropractic reviews on best back support for office chair and found this one. Decided to give it a try and was PLEASANTLY surprised. I highly recommend. this one. Easy to put on your chair and it stays put! No slipping down or need to constantly adjust. I set it up once and done! I no longer have back pain at the end of the day.
customer_reviews.author: LizzieJane

customer_reviews.title: Does The Job!
customer_reviews.text: My 2013 van has no lunbar support adjustment. My wife has back problems so I tried this. I worked perfect. The only nit I have is the straps are NOT long enough to fit modern seats.
customer_reviews.author: Danpb

customer_reviews.title: Didn’t work for me !
customer_reviews.text: It wasn’t a good fit for the size of my car seat so I couldn’t lock it in position. However, tried to use it without locking . It was kind of big and uncomfortable, not a good fit for me . May work for someone else. Returned !
customer_reviews.author: AraK

customer_reviews.title: Perfectly supportive
customer_reviews.text: Very supportive but soft! Doesn’t make my pain go away if I am hurting but it helps prevent pain in the first place.
customer_reviews.author: lovemykids05Top Contributor: Baby

customer_reviews.title: Awesome back support!
customer_reviews.text: My lower back/ SI joints hurt sometimes. I see a chiropractor twice a week, but anything I can do to keep things in alignment helps in between visits. I keep this in my car and it works wonders and has never failed. Winter/Summer/Fall, it works great. I'm very satisfied with how well this back support has functioned. Pros: - Great Back Support - Doesn't Slip - Memory Foam feels great. Cons: - None That I can think of
customer_reviews.author: Adam B.

customer_reviews.title: Great Support Cushion - bought a second one
customer_reviews.text: Tired of moving between chairs so this is the second one I have bought. Too large for airplane travel but great for around the house and office. It is just too big to take on airplane, at least for me. Highly recommend- I have bought two.
customer_reviews.author: E. Brad

customer_reviews.title: Requires Prolonged Configuration
customer_reviews.text: It will take time to find the correct placement in office seats; however, greatly helps promote good posture when sitting leading to long-term benefits for the upper spine regions.
customer_reviews.author: Special K

customer_reviews.title: That mixed with horrible posture makes my life miserable sometimes at work
customer_reviews.text: I work in an office so I am sitting at a computer most of every day. I've had issues with my back for as long as I can remember and have two deteriorating discs in my lower back. That mixed with horrible posture makes my life miserable sometimes at work. I decided to go out on a limb and give this a shot, and I really just wish I would have done it months ago. It had made my chair some much more comfortable and my back pain has eased while sitting at a computer.
customer_reviews.author: Shana Klutz

customer_reviews.title: Support and comfort
customer_reviews.text: I just received this and put it behind my back on my couch. What a difference! I have been sitting, couch bound from an operation and my back was starting to kill me. This gives me instant support, comfort and seems very durable. Very happy with this purchase!!
customer_reviews.author: N. Winrod

customer_reviews.title: My husband wonders how he did without it
customer_reviews.text: Our truck doesn't have lumbar support, so we purchased to see if this would help his back during the commute. Happy to say - yes it does - and how it adjusts is wonderful!
customer_reviews.author: Ann

customer_reviews.title: Relieves pain in my aching back
customer_reviews.text: I recently had back surgery and was experiencing a lot of pain sitting in a chair or riding in the car. This cushion helps so very much. I got the purple one because it is my favorite color and it is beautiful.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: A keeper!
customer_reviews.text: I had ordered another back support cushion but it was too hard and thin in the center. This one however is just perfect. The memory foam is soft but fully supportive. The mesh breathable cloth cover really does keep it cool. No heat build up on your back. No more back pain. This is a keeper.
customer_reviews.author: Kikicat

customer_reviews.title: Best for work chairs!! To eliminate back pain!!
customer_reviews.text: The best thing I ever bought for my back. I sit a lot for work and i was having a lot of lower back pain. One of my co workers recommended me to get one of these and it was the best advise ever!! I’ve never have had lower back pain since I used this! Definitely recommend!
customer_reviews.author: ERIKA HERRERA

customer_reviews.title: Best cushion ever
customer_reviews.text: This is the best cushion I ever had in my life. It releases a lot of my low back pain while correcting my back posture. I bought three for different purposes.
customer_reviews.author: John

customer_reviews.title: Awesome and inexpensive fix to a painful problem
customer_reviews.text: I recently purchased a used motorhome that has Flexsteel driver seat. I shortly found out that the seat was not friendly at all to my back as it had little lumbar support. It was to the point that I had to be pulled out of my seat after driving it hurt so bad. I purchased this support cushion and just finished a 450 mile trip and my back feels fine. Wow! Met and exceeded all my expectations.
customer_reviews.author: steven d petarra

customer_reviews.title: Not so much for chairs, but great for the car!
customer_reviews.text: I tried to use this on a regular chair in the house, but it didn't work too well. However, the reason I give it 4 stars is because I use it in my car, and it's really useful there. My back feels nice a supported, and it does well staying in one place. I even bought one for my passenger seat for when I'm not driving!
customer_reviews.author: pennedname

customer_reviews.title: Good product, good support from the company!
customer_reviews.text: Straps are adjustable for different sized chairs. Nice back support, just what I was looking for. Also, had a strap break after maybe a year or so and they were very gracious to send me a new cover that had new straps!
customer_reviews.author: cluckinchicken

customer_reviews.title: Nice product and satisfied with this purchase.
customer_reviews.text: I just received this today and so far comfortable and does support my back in my recliner. Also well made and looks nice. The only negative is that it has two extension straps and the connectors on one are too big for the strap connectors. Hopefully I can get that replaced and just what I was looking for.
customer_reviews.author: CW

customer_reviews.title: Very Comfortable Support
customer_reviews.text: Have bought several! Very comfortable and such nice quality. Perfect for back support at home and in my car! Thanks for the quick service!👍😉😁
customer_reviews.author: Jannie Patterson

customer_reviews.title: ... back issues and finally figured out that I needed better support for the office chair
customer_reviews.text: I've been experiencing back issues and finally figured out that I needed better support for the office chair. The old back cushion was stiff foam which I could not use for any length of time. With the memory foam I'm good all day, have significantly less back painand have just ordered another one so I don't have to lug it back and forth between home and the office because I refuse to be without it. Great product. David Tucker
customer_reviews.author: David Tucker

customer_reviews.title: Awesome comfort, support and pain relief
customer_reviews.text: I love the fact that this was designed for comfort, support and pain relief but what I love just as much is the fact that it is light, easy to carry and easy to clean.
customer_reviews.author: Norma Jean

customer_reviews.title: Great lumbar pillow
customer_reviews.text: I’ve had lower back pain on and off for the past six months or so. I bought this pillow about a month ago and have had only very minor pain since then! I hooked it up to my work chair and it has just been a lifesaver. Also, I just began bringing it with me on long road trips and it has been a game changer! Very comfortable, you’ll forget it’s even there. Must buy for lower back pain due to sitting for long periods at a time!
customer_reviews.author: Amanda H

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: I love this cushion. I'm working in my chair all day most days and it causes me to have lower back problems. This supports my lower back so when I'm sitting and working, my back is supported by this cushion to help relieve the pressure. There's so many colors to choose from and I will be purchasing another one so I have one for both my home and work place
customer_reviews.author: Annie

customer_reviews.title: Satisfactory, not spectacular
customer_reviews.text: The support works to some extent. Not flexible in different sitting situations without manual maneuvering which can be inconvenient. Okay, is the best grade I'd give this product!
customer_reviews.author: gilty7

customer_reviews.title: Great for Office Chairs
customer_reviews.text: I bought this a while back for my office chair at work and I loved it. Great Support! I decided to buy another one for my office chair at home and it is great, also love the color!
customer_reviews.author: Ashley Corbett

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't fit short people as well
customer_reviews.text: There's nothing really wrong with this pillow; I gave it two stars only because it didn't fit for me and likely won't fit other short people. The sellers are aware of this, but I ran out of time to make an exchange. As a 5 ft. tall person, the pillow was too thick for me, and having it on my office chair meant that my back was in contact with the pillow only (and no other part of the chair back. So for shorter people, it might be better to buy a pillow that is less thick and more seamlessly fits with the chair.
customer_reviews.author: Enna

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: I've used this a couple days now and it feels very comfortable. I do recommend this product overall.
customer_reviews.author: Allison Fowler

customer_reviews.title: Great value
customer_reviews.text: It’s comfotable. Gel-like rather than foam like. I use it in my car after I hurt my back. I do wish that it was wider. I’m an average size person and it’s could be a little wider but don’t let that stop you from buying it. It’s a GREAT price. I bought it after reading wirecutter’s reccomendation.
customer_reviews.author: jacquesmama

product_meta.title: LOVEHOME Memory Foam Lumbar Support Back Cushion with 3D Mesh Cover Balanced Firmness Designed for Lower Back Pain Relief- Ideal Back Pillow for Computer/Office Chair, Car Seat, Recliner etc. - Black
feature_bullets: ALLEVIATES LOWER BACK PAIN - relieve lower and mid back pain and tightness from long time sitting or driving; support your back's curve to achieve perfect spinal alignment and promote a healthy posture. Chiropractor recommended orthopedic lumbar support cushion for surgery recovery and people who suffers from Lumbosacral lower back pain and Spondylosis, etc.

STURDY SUPPORTIVE AND EFFECTIVE- Ergonomic Streamlining molded with premium quality memory foam for optimal lumbar support and never flattens out, a proper firmness memory foam compresses to take the shape of your back and curve and provide comfort and relief numbness of your back

UPDATE TWO ADJUSTABLE STRAPS INSTEAD OF THE ONE ON BACK keeps the back support cushion in place and prevent the lumbar pillow from sliding down, two extension straps make the backrest fits perfectly on any office chair, computer chair, armchair, sofa, couch, car seat, SUV, truck, wheelchair and recliner seat etc.

BREATHABLE REMOVABLE AND WASHABLE 3D mesh ventilative cover keeps air circulating so sweat and moisture doesn’t fill it up, to keep you cool and comfortable all day long. Ideal for office gift and business gift etc. Great gift idea for people sitting for long time such as office clerk, truck/taxi driver etc.
60 DAYS LOVE IT OR RETURN IT– Risk Free, hassle free 60 days return window, try it now with no worries. Two extension straps included which makes it easy attach to office chair car lumbar support etc
